definitions.definition: To brighten with, or as with, a rainbow ; to pattern with the colours of the rainbow.
To take the appearance of a rainbow .
In climbing gyms where the rocks to climb are colored to indicate suggested climbing routes , to climb rocks of different colors, thereby ignoring such routes.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To brighten with, or as with, a rainbow ; to pattern with the colours of the rainbow.
secondary_definitions: ( intransitive ) To take the appearance of a rainbow .
( climbing ) In climbing gyms where the rocks to climb are colored to indicate suggested climbing routes , to climb rocks of different colors, thereby ignoring such routes.
